dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
Miss604, Jul-06 09:44 pm (PDT):

Tell us about yourself: I am the copyright owner.
Your full name: [redacted]
Job title: Owner, Founder Miss604.com, sixty4media

Email address: [redacted]
Street address: [redacted]
City: Vancouver
State/Province: BC
Postal code: V6G1G4
Country: Canada
Phone number(optional): [REDACTED]
Fax number(optional): n/a

Description of original work: My photo (of me) on Flickr from 2007: http://www.flickr.com/photos/miss604/1460198588/

Reported Twitter account: mistymargolis
Description of Infringement: This Twitter account is using my image as their profile image and background. My photo (of me) is from 2007 and marked as "All Rights Reserved" on Flickr. I would like this account to remove my image.
Type of infringing material: Background image
Type of infringing material: Avatar (profile picture)
Type of infringing material: n/a
512(f) Acknowledgment: I understand that under 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512(f), I may be liable for any damages, including costs and attorneys' fees, if I knowingly materially misrepresent that reported material or activity is infringing.

Good Faith Belief: I have good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Authority to Act: The information in this notification is accurate, and I state under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Signature: [redacted]
